tasks.label: git-commit-push-now
tasks.command: cd /workspaces/CVOPro && git add app/client_routes.py app/notifications.py render.yaml README.md .vscode/tasks.json && git commit -m "feat: resilient uploads, 6pm recap, custom domain wiring" -m "- accept json/txt imports and production fallback capture" -m "- keep 6pm owner summary flow and jess/jessica alias coverage" -m "- configure medpharmahub.com and www in render.yaml" -m "- document custom domain setup" && git push origin main
